frontmatter.title: AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry Lambda Support For Python
frontmatter.description: The AWS managed Lambda layer for ADOT Python provides a plug and play user experience by automatically instrumenting a Lambda function, by packaging [OpenTelemetry Python](https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-python) together with an out-of-the-box configuration for AWS Lambda and AWS X-Ray. Users can enable and disable OpenTelemetry for their Lambda function without changing code.
